colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B ('DI NI MNAN PAS RGYAS PA BYED MI NUS PA'I LAS DANG PO PA RNAMS LA LAG LEN DU MJUG PA BDE KHYER BKOD PA YIN LA, ,RGYAS PAR 'DOD PA RNAMS KYIS DAM CAN SGRUB BSKOR LAS GSUNGS PA'I DAM SRI SPUN GSUM DANG BSE RAGS MCHED BZHI GNAN NO, ,RJE BTZUN DHARMA BADZRA GYIS MDZAD PA'I MNAN CHOG RDO RJE LHUN PO BRTZEGS PA SOGS CHOG GA RGYAS PA RNAMS LA SPYAR NAS SGRUB SHES PAR BYA'O, ,DAM CHOS SGRUB PA RNAMS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
